title: Add Founder Dilkhush photo to the site

requirements.text: Add the uploaded Founder Dilkhush photo as a static asset and use it anywhere the app currently shows the default owner photo, ensuring it renders correctly across header, About, and the Owner/Meet-the-Owners section.
acceptanceCriteria: A square, web-optimized founder photo file exists under frontend/public/assets/ (use the generated filename from this build request).

All places that render the generic/default OwnerPhoto (e.g., header OwnerPhoto and About section OwnerPhoto in frontend/src/App.tsx) use the Founder Dilkhush imageSrc and an alt text of "Founder Dilkhush".
On image load failure, the UI still falls back to /assets/generated/profile-placeholder.dim_512x512.png as implemented in frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx.

requirements.text: Update the OwnerPhoto component default imageSrc so that if no imageSrc prop is passed, it uses the new Founder Dilkhush static asset instead of /assets/IMG-20260207-WA0000.jpg.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/src/components/OwnerPhoto.tsx default imageSrc points to the new founder image asset path.
No references to /assets/IMG-20260207-WA0000.jpg remain as the default fallback in OwnerPhoto.

requirements.text: Render the generated founder photo asset from frontend/public/assets/ in the app (do not route image serving through the backend canister).
acceptanceCriteria: The founder image is referenced via a public-path URL (e.g., /assets/...) and loads in production builds without any backend changes.

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not modify immutable frontend hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep backend as single-actor Motoko; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Adding or changing Internet Identity authentication behavior.
Adding new admin features or order/payment logic changes.

required: Cropped square headshot photo centered on the face with neutral/softened background (founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg)
Small square headshot crop centered on the face (founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg)

goalsToAdd: Show the Founder Dilkhush photo on the website/app.
